meta.vex_source_label: Police Handling of Harassment Complaint Notebook LM

event.title: 101 call – Officer assignment confirmed (PC Gasson) and duplicate CRNs

legal_breaches_hypothesised: Victims’ Code: right to be kept informed (no officer contact; updates withheld)

death_by_silence.escalation_note: Officer assignment revealed by victim chase call; no proactive contact recorded.

quotes_key.quote: It's nothing for you to worry about… it's just how we record it.
We can't give you updates over the phone because of data.
